item.title: Hugo Migration Implementation Steps
item.description: Hugo Migration Implementation Steps üü¢ Active ‚Ü©Ô∏è Back to Hugo Migration Executive Summary Overview This document provides a detailed, step-by-step guide for implementing the ScopeCam MCP documentation migration to Hugo. The implementation process is designed to integrate seamlessly with the project’s existing containerized development environment and automation frameworks. Prerequisites Access to the ScopeCam MCP repository Familiarity with the Containerized Development Environment Docker or Podman installed locally Basic understanding of Hugo Git and GitHub access Phase 1: Foundation Setup 1.
